text: Need Brandon Nelson for Red Rooster campaign. Budget around $12,621, looking for 3 x Twitter post, 2 x 90-second product demo, 3 x Twitter post, 3 x Facebook story, 1 x 2-minute tutorial. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
